page.title: 14THE MAYOR OF HAILSHAM
page.content: The Mayor of Hailsham has been the Mayor for two years. He is retired and does his work for pleasure. He is re-elected by the council every May. His most important job is to go to the meetings of the Town Council which he leads. The Mayor enjoys talking to children. He also likes opening fetes and giving out prizes. For official functions he wears a {chain of office.}This is a medallion on a chain which he wears round his neck. If he goes out to a different town he wears the medallion on a blue ribbon to show that he is not the Mayor of the Town he is visiting. On the medallion there is a{windmill {a shepherd's crook ,rake}and a wheatsheaf. In the other two quarters are{Sussex Martlets}and items used in a {string factory.
